panels.description: Number of indexes in each shard. Expected to be equal across all shards
panels.title: Number of indexes

panels.description: The total number of <field> across all indexes in the db.
panels.title: Fields count

panels.description: The total number of indexes running a background indexing and/or background query processing operation.
panels.title: Active indexes

panels.description: Total count of indexes currently running a background query process.
panels.title: Active indexes running queries

panels.description: Total count of indexes currently undergoing a background indexing process.
panels.title: Active indexes indexing

panels.description: The memory allocated by all indexes in the bdb
panels.title: Total Indexes memory

panels.description: The memory usage of the index with the largest memory usage in the shard
panels.title: Max memory index

panels.description: The average memory usage of the indexes in the db
panels.title: Average memory per index

panels.description: The total number of background queries currently being executed.
panels.title: Active queries

panels.description: Processed Queries Latency (When using cursors, not counting reading from existing cursors)
panels.title: Processed queries server latency

panels.description: Query Commands Latency (including FT.SEARCH, FT.AGGREGATE, and FT.CURSOR READ).
panels.title: Query commands server latency

panels.description: server throughput for processed query (When using cursors, not counting reading from existing cursors)
panels.title: QPS (processed queries)

panels.description: server throughput for all query commands (including FT.SEARCH, FT.AGGREGATE, and FT.CURSOR READ).
panels.title: QPS (query commands)

panels.description: The total number of user and internal cursors, either holding pending results or actively executing FT.CURSOR READ.
panels.title: Total cursors

panels.description: The total number of user and internal cursors currently holding pending results.
panels.title: Idle cursors

panels.description: The total number of indexing failures recorded across all indexes.
panels.title: Indexing failures

panels.description: The number of failures in the index with the maximum number of failures per shard.
panels.title: Max indexing failures

panels.description: The total number of indexing failures caused by attempts to index a <field> field in the db.
panels.title: Per field Indexing failures

panels.description: The total amount of memory freed by the garbage collectors from indexes.
panels.title: Total memory collected

panels.description: The average amount of memory reclaimed by the garbage collector during each cycle.
panels.title: Average memory collected / cycle

panels.description: The average cycle duration of all GC's in each shard
panels.title: Average gc cycle duration

panels.description: The number of documents marked as deleted whose memory has not yet been freed by the garbage collector.
panels.title: Total marked deleted docs

panels.description: The number of vectors marked as deleted in the vector indexes that have not yet been cleaned.
panels.title: Total marked deleted vectors

panels.description: The total number of <field> with sortable attributes across all indexes in the db.
panels.title: Sortable fields count

panels.description: The total number of <field> with NoIndex attribute, i.e used for sorting only but not indexed, across all indexes in the db.
panels.title: NoIndex fields count

panels.description: The total number of vector indexes of each algorithm across all indexes in the db.
panels.title: Vector indexes count

panels.description: The total number of <field> with CASESENSITIVE attribute. Currently, only applicable for TAG fields.
panels.title: Case sensitive fields count
